## ControlSchemaMap type

Represents a map of properties from TForm with an associated control schema

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ControlSchemaMap<TForm extends object> = {
    [P in keyof TForm]: AbstractDynamicControl<TForm[P] extends object ? TForm[P] : never, never, TForm[P], Maybe<Type<ControlComponent<TForm[P], any>>>, any>;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [AbstractDynamicControl](./dynamic-forms.abstractdynamiccontrol.md)<!-- -->, [ControlComponent](./dynamic-forms.controlcomponent.md)
